Method Detail

distance

public double distance(SparseVector a,
                       SparseVector b)
Gives the Minkowski distance between two vectors. distance(x,y) := \left( \Sum_i=0^d-1 \left| x_i - y_i \right|^q \right)^\frac{1}{q} for 1<=q
